department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
short_summary: CLASSROOM TABLES TO MULTIPLE LOCATIONS WITHIN CANADA
description: The government department needs to purchase, deliver and install classroom tables to multiple locations within Canada by 07 August 2023. Please access the full request for bid (RFB) and attachments on your SAP Ariba account.
full_summary:
---

### Tender Notice

**RFx ID:** WS3918935803  
**RFx Title:** Collaborative Furniture - Classroom Tables  
**RFx Description:** Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC) invites submissions for the purchase, delivery, and installation of classroom tables to multiple locations within Canada, on or before August 7, 2023.

#### Background
The Canadian School of Public Service (CSPS) requires a significant quantity of classroom tables to meet the needs of its educational institutions across the country. In response to this requirement, PSPC has issued a Request for Bid (RFB) to acquire these tables from qualified suppliers.

#### RFx Details
- **RFx Type:** Request for Bid (RFB)  
- **Procurement Method:** Competitive – Open Bidding  
- **Contracting Entity:** Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC)  
- **End-User Entities:** Canada School of Public Service (CSPS)  
- **Trade Agreements:** Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA), and other relevant international trade agreements  

#### Tender Requirements
Bidders must submit a technical bid and a price bid. The successful bidder will be required to purchase, deliver, and install the classroom tables to multiple locations within Canada by August 7, 2023.

#### Contract Value and Performance Period
The contract value and performance period are not specified in this notice. Further information can be found in the Request for Bid (RFB) documents.

#### Closing Date and Location
The RFB closing date is June 12, 2023, at 14:00:00 (Eastern Time). Bidders must register on the SAP Ariba platform and complete their Government of Canada profile to access the RFB documents.

#### Contact Information
To obtain further information or clarification regarding the RFB, please contact:
Christopher Finnigan  
Public Services and Procurement Canada  
christopher.finnigan@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
